title: 8: Why Democrats Need to Fight Like Hell
itunes:title: Why Democrats Need to Fight Like Hell
description: Joe explains the difference between how Democrats and Republicans fight, and why it’s time for the Party of FDR to fight nihilism with nihilism. Derek Trucks also drops by to talk about what’s next for the legendary Tedeschi Trucks Band.
itunes:author: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
dc:creator: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
